known_issues: Admin panel - Inventory tab: Stock status should only show available stock with low stock highlighting
Admin panel - Inventory tab: Cannot write ingredient name in stock input field
Admin panel - Products tab: Added bowl products not displaying in the list
Admin panel - Customers tab: 'Failed to add customer' error when attempting to add new customers

existing_features.title: In the Inventory tab Stock Status view, display only ingredients that have stock available (quantity > 0). Highlight rows where stock is below the low stock threshold.
In the Products tab, ensure that newly added bowl products appear in the product list immediately after creation.
In the Customers tab, resolve the 'Failed to add customer' error that occurs when attempting to add new customers. Investigate and fix the backend customer creation logic and frontend error handling.

new_feature_requests.summary: In the Inventory tab Stock In form, fix the ingredient name input field so users can type and select ingredient names properly.

projectName: Fix admin panel issues in inventory, products, and customers
